a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in CO₂ emissions and GDP

Consumption-based emissions
are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures
fossil

fuel and industry emissions
. Land-use change is not included.
Data source: Eurostat, OECD, and World Bank (2025); Global Carbon Budget (2024)

Note: GDP is measured in
international-$
at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
